results.title: React Native Developer
results.descriptions:
We are looking for a React Native developer interested in building mobile apps on both the IOS and Android platforms using React Native for highly scalable E commerce solutions.

Must have hands on experience on developing IOS and android apps using React Native framework.
Ability to write well - documented, clean JavaScript code including ES6+ syntax Knowledge of ((functional or object - oriented))
Familiarity with native build tools, like XCode, Gradle ((Android Studio, IntelliJ))
Understanding of REST APIs, the document request model, and offline storage.
Good understanding of React Design Principles.
Development experience with EXPO SDK is a big plus.


Good to Have
-------------------------
Experience with REST APIs.
Familiarity with the Git version control system.
Familiarity with DevOps processes and tools (AWS, Docker, Cloudflare etc).
Knowledge with Wordpress (Woocommerce) APIs and plugins.

Experience
------------------
**Candidates with portfolio showcasing past relevant works will be given preference.


Please review the job description in detail and make sure you absolutely meet the job requirements.
If you do then:
- Send your resume to "smbddrive@gmail.com” with the email subject "Application for the post - React Developer”. Please send the resume in PDF format.
results.responsibilities:
Key Responsibilities
------------------------
Develop highly scalable E-commerce app (IOS and Android) using React Native.
Ensuring high-performance and availability, and managing all technical aspects of the app.
results.other_benefits:
Regular working hours: 8 hours/day, 5 days a week.
Lunch and Travel allowance.
Yearly paid leave 20 days.
Festival Bonus (Twice in a Year)
Profit Bonus (Yearly)
Annual performance evaluation and increment.
results.raw_content:
Job opportunity for React Native Developers

Position: Mid-level React Native mobile application developer
Number of vacancies: 01

We are looking for a React Native developer interested in building mobile apps on both the IOS and Android platforms using React Native for highly scalable E commerce solutions.

Key Responsibilities
------------------------
Develop highly scalable E-commerce app (IOS and Android) using React Native.
Ensuring high-performance and availability, and managing all technical aspects of the app.

Job requirements
-----------------------

Must have hands on experience on developing IOS and android apps using React Native framework.
Ability to write well - documented, clean JavaScript code including ES6+ syntax Knowledge of ((functional or object - oriented))
Familiarity with native build tools, like XCode, Gradle ((Android Studio, IntelliJ))
Understanding of REST APIs, the document request model, and offline storage.
Good understanding of React Design Principles.
Development experience with EXPO SDK is a big plus.


Good to Have
-------------------------
Experience with REST APIs.
Familiarity with the Git version control system.
Familiarity with DevOps processes and tools (AWS, Docker, Cloudflare etc).
Knowledge with Wordpress (Woocommerce) APIs and plugins.

Experience
------------------
- At least 2 years experience in App Developments.

**Candidates with portfolio showcasing past relevant works will be given preference.


Salary And Benefits
---------------------------
- Range BDT 35K - 45K. Will be determined based on experience and qualification.
- Regular working hours: 8 hours/day, 5 days a week.
- Lunch and Travel allowance.
- Yearly paid leave 20 days.
- Festival Bonus (Twice in a Year)
- Profit Bonus (Yearly)
- Annual performance evaluation and increment.

Please review the job description in detail and make sure you absolutely meet the job requirements.
If you do then:
- Send your resume to "smbddrive@gmail.com” with the email subject "Application for the post - React Developer”. Please send the resume in PDF format.

Application Deadline: 07 March 2020
Address:Road:8, House-1, Block-J, Baridhara,Dhaka

results.title: Trainee (CMS Development)
results.descriptions:
-Freshers Can Apply
-The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Software Development, IT Enabled Service

Additional Requirements
-Age 23 to 35 years
-Both males and females are allowed to apply
-Must have strong commutation skill in English, both written & spoken
-Sound interpersonal & Team working skills.
-Ability to take multiple assignments.
-Should be able to work extended hours if needed.

Company Rules & Benefits: As per Company policy.

Apply Instructions: E-mail your CV by 29th March
results.responsibilities:
-Should have good knowledge on Core PHP, MySQL, HTML5, XML, CSS3, JavaScript, Ajax, jQuery.
-A background in object-oriented design and development strategies
-Should have experience with various CMS platforms: Wordpress, Joomla, Drupal
results.education: -B. Sc in Computer Science or related subject (Educational qualification can be compromised if enough experienced and self-motivated).
